title: I recieved a reward.
body: How can I check it? The message went away

replies.body:
I looked over your account to see if I could find out what that reward might have been. It looks like recently you were able to get on our Universe page to get the Demacia Icon, so that notification may have been for that icon. I also saw that you were able to get some key fragments earlier today, so that notification may have been for a fragment instead.

Let me know if either of those sounds right!

> I looked over your account to see if I could find out what that reward might have been. It looks like recently you were able to get on our Universe page to get the Demacia Icon, so that notification may have been for that icon. I also saw that you were able to get some key fragments earlier today, so that notification may have been for a fragment instead.
> 
> Let me know if either of those sounds right!

You're right, it was summoner icon. Thank you

You can not find what your rewards are. It all depends what it was. If it was a chest or a key fragment then click the "Loot" button in the top mid/right or the Chest icon in the top right of the old client. If it was a summoner icon click your summoner icon and your new ones will be listed first.
